name: Singularity Dungeon Demo
description:
Singularity Dungeon is an Action RPG game made with Pixel Art graphics.

Break through countless dungeons, defeat hordes of enemies, collect and improve equipment, fight with bosses.
The equipment is available in three rarities: common, magic and legendary.

All dungeons are made with great attention to details and contain secret passages and places.

3 professions to choose from: Knight, Archer and Mage. Lots of equipment for each class lets you customize not only abilities of your character but also appearance.
Every profession has some unique skills.
Lots of "perks" to build your hero to your liking.

Singularity Dungeon has Loot/Inventory system. The equipment can have three different rarities - Common, Magic and Legendary. So far we added over 200 unique items, which can come in different rarity and can be upgraded for up to +9 or used to craft powerful special singularity items!
